objectives: Students will discuss technology in daily life using Slang/Street register language
Students will engage with Fantasy themed scenarios related to technology in daily life
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of slang level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining technology in daily life content with Fantasy narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore technology in daily life through a Fantasy lens using Slang/Street language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a magical or fantastical situation involving technology in daily life

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice slang register vocabulary related to technology in daily life in a fantasy context
Students engage in fantasy themed role-play about technology in daily life using slang register
Students create original fantasy themed content about technology in daily life in slang register

discussion_questions: How would you describe technology in daily life in a Fantasy scenario?
What magical or enchanted might be involved in technology in daily life?
Can you create a Fantasy story about technology in daily life?
How does technology in daily life change when viewed through a Fantasy perspective?
What slang register expressions would you use to discuss this fantasy scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Fantasy situation involving technology in daily life
roles: Character A: Using slang register in fantasy context
Character B: Responding in slang register within fantasy theme

topic_genre_blend: technology in daily life with magical
technology in daily life with enchanted
technology in daily life with mystical

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Slang/Street throughout: Casual street language, colloquialisms, youth speak
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Fantasy theme: Magic, mythical creatures, imaginary worlds

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Slang/Street register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Fantasy themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of slang register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
